message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. I think you'll be thrilled with this investment.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer you've made. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000.
Hi Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I see you recognize the value of this product.  While $10,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,500?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000.
